product.title: Kawaii Travel Neck Support Pillow Dino Tiger Dog Bunny Plushie
product.body_html:
• Description
  • Cleaning
  • Shipping

  • Do you love travelling but hate neck pain?

    We definitely understand how you feel and that's why we made these awesome pillows! Suited for kawaii lovers who are looking for a new nap buddy that is light and accessible - take this with you whilst you travel the world and wave goodbye to neck pain.

    Wrap these friendly pillows around your neck all night long featuring nine different styles with cute expressions, animals, and a unique shape made to support your neck and head! Filled with 100% high-quality PP cotton and a velvet-like outer material which makes them irresistibly soft.

    Measures 28 x 28 x 10cm and weighs around 200g.


    What are you waiting for?

    Get the perfect night's sleep whilst you travel so when you arrive at your destination you are energised, awake and free from neck pain. This isn't just any old neck support pillow, the shape is made to support your neck even more compared to the basic ones you get down the road.

    An unforgettable gift for travellers

    Our neck support pillow collection makes for the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, and every other special occasion you can think of! This will definitely be used all year round and for many years to come.

    Features

    ✈️ Filling: PP Cotton Mini Foam Particles 
    ✈️ Outer material: Polyurethane Fiber
    ✈️ Helps with your sleeping position
    ✈️ Nine designs to choose from
    ✈️ Unique shape to support your neck
    ✈️ Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material
    ✈️ Allergy-free and asthma friendly

    Plushie sizes:

    Measurements may be off by 1-3cm due to the nature of how PP cotton expands and compresses.

  • Step 1: Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

    Step 2: Wash our plushie in cold water using a mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the plushie in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the plushie has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to 200+ countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Due to the pandemic delivery times may vary between 5 to 30 business days with possibilities of delays. Please be patient with the postal services as they try their best to deliver your plushies to you in a timely manner. Find out more about the delays here.
